title: Chai Tea Cakes in a Mug
directions: Mix flour, salt, and chai tea powder together.
Stir in the egg, water and coconut oil until combined.
Spray the mug/s with cooking spray before adding the mixture.
Fill 1 large mug or 2 medium size mugs to halfway, and heat in the microwave on high for 3 minutes.
ingredients: 3 tbsp coconut oil, heated into liquid form
